content.title: What a first week!
content.creator:
James Cox
March 6, 2025
content.content:
Thank you to everyone who has backed this project so far! I can't wait to start fulfilling these orders! I've had some great feedback and I've been amazed at the response we've had so far!
I have now made multiples and option as someone has pointed out this isn't possible without racking up huge shipping fees.
If you have any questions, don't hesistate to ask! I've been trying to respond as quickly as possible.
